Title: Natural Bing Maps Navigation using Kinect for Windows and Multitouch Display
Description: Natural Bing Maps Navigation using Kinect for Windows and Multitouch
HomeWiki:
Natural Bing Maps Navigation using Kinect for Windows and Multitouch Display
 

Description

The main goals of the project were to create a demo application that uses Kinect for Windows and large multitouch display for interaction with Bing Maps using gestures in several modes and find the most natural way to interact with maps. All gesture are continuous and detected/recognized according to the hand state and position of a user. This application has number of interaction modes and was developed with single user control.

  Demo Video

Minimum Hardware Requirement

32 bit (x86) or 64 bit (x64) processor*

Dual-core 2.66-GHz or faster processor

Dedicated USB 2.0 bus

2 GB RAM

Kinect for Windows

Minimum Software Requirement

Windows 8 or later

.NET 4.5**

Kinect for Windows SDK 1.8

* v1.1 supports only 64 bit (x64) processor

** v1.1 supports only .NET 4.5.1
